scripts.text:
-- remove old new recrords
--delete S
--from [dbo].[Autotelex_stock] S 
--inner join OPENJSON(@voorraad_Json)
--	WITH (adsStockId INT '$.adsStockId') as f on f.adsStockId = S.adsStockId

--insert new data
	insert into [dbo].[Autotelex_stock]
        SELECT *
	FROM OPENJSON(@voorraad_Json)
	WITH (
	    establishmentId INT 'strict $.establishmentId',
		adsStockId INT '$.adsStockId',
		licensePlate NVARCHAR(50) '$.vehicleInfo.licensePlate',
		advertisementTitle nvarchar(255)  '$.advertisementTitle',
		isAdvertised nvarchar(5) '$.isAdvertised',
		modifiedDateUtc nvarchar(50) '$.modifiedDateUtc',
		ownerEstablishmentId INT 'strict $.ownerEstablishmentId',
		companyId INT 'strict $.companyId',
		physicalLocationId INT 'strict $.physicalLocationId',
		stockStatus NVARCHAR(50) 'strict $.stockStatus',
		stockType NVARCHAR(50) 'strict $.stockType',
		soldTimestampUtc NVARCHAR(50) 'strict $.soldTimestampUtc',
		inStockTimestampUtc NVARCHAR(50) 'strict $.inStockTimestampUtc',
		presenceStartDate NVARCHAR(50) 'strict $.presenceStartDate',
		presenceEndDate NVARCHAR(50) 'strict $.presenceEndDate',
		deletedDateTimeUtc NVARCHAR(50) 'strict $.deletedDateTimeUtc',
		isDeleted nvarchar(5) 'strict $.isDeleted',
		highlights NVARCHAR(255) 'strict $.highlights',
		category NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.category',
		priceType NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.priceType',
		internalIdentificationNumber NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.internalIdentificationNumber',
		vehicleTarget NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleTarget',
		stickerText NVARCHAR(255) 'strict $.stickerText',
		useManufacturerOptionName NVARCHAR(5) 'strict $.useManufacturerOptionName',
		tradeText NVARCHAR(255) 'strict $.tradeText',
		dmsReference NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.dmsReference',
		vehicleInfo_displacement NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.displacement',
		vehicleInfo_mileage NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.mileage',
		vehicleInfo_power NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.power',
		vehicleInfo_powerUnit NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.powerUnit',
		vehicleInfo_make NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.make',
		vehicleInfo_model NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.model',
		vehicleInfo_baseColor NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.baseColor',
		vehicleInfo_bpmAmountGross NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.bpmAmountGross',
		vehicleInfo_design NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.design',
		vehicleInfo_fuelType NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.fuelType',
		vehicleInfo_transmission NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.transmission',
		vehicleInfo_vehicleType NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.vehicleType',
		vehicleInfo_version NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.version',
		vehicleInfo_vin NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.vin',
		vehicleInfo_gears NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.gears',
		vehicleInfo_seats NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.seats',
		vehicleInfo_baseColor2 NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.baseColor2',
		vehicleInfo_colorExterior NVARCHAR(25) 'strict $.vehicleInfo.colorExterior',
		vehicleInfo_batteryCapacity int 'strict $.vehicleInfo.batteryCapacity',
		vehicleInfo_achievableActionRadius int 'strict $.vehicleInfo.achievableActionRadius'
	  ) b



	--[], [string[,
	--[], 
	--[], [string[,
	--[], [string[,
	--[], [string[,
	--[], [string[,
	--[], [string[,
	--[], [string[,
	--[], 
	--[], 
	--[], [string[,
	--[], [string[,
	--[vehicleInfo_lacquerTint], [string[,
	--[vehicleInfo_colorInterior], [string[,
	--[vehicleInfo_externalCharging], true,
	--[], 
	--[vehicleInfo_maxChargeSpeedAC], 
	--[vehicleInfo_maxChargeSpeedDC], 
	--[vehicleInfo_minChargeTimeHoursAC], 
	--[vehicleInfo_minChargeTimeHoursDC], 
	--[vehicleInfo_minChargeTimeMinutesAC], 
	--[vehicleInfo_minChargeTimeMinutesDC], 
	--[vehicleInfo_minChargeTimeFromAC], 
	--[vehicleInfo_minChargeTimeFromDC], 
	--[vehicleInfo_minChargeTimeToAC], 
	--[vehicleInfo_minChargeTimeToDC], 
	--[],

select @maxdate = 
CAST(
      max(
         DATEDIFF_BIG(MILLISECOND, '1970-01-01', CONVERT(DATETIME, left([modifiedDateUtc],23),126)))
   AS VARCHAR(20))
  FROM [dbo].[Autotelex_stock]
